partner-block.title: Partnered with the best in Web3 gaming

card-1.description: Meta Apes is a free-to-play, play-and-earn MMO strategy game. Set in a post-apocalyptic world, in which humanity has ended and a new era ruled by Apes has begun. Next on the agenda is space domination. Each pri-mate (yes, you) will have to work closely with their Gang to become the strongest Clan and win the ultimate race to space.

card-2.description: Find your favorite character and battle for the fate of a universe at crossroads. Starfall Arena is the first web3 MOBA with a focus on competitive gameplay and eSports. Focused on rewarding top players through community operated tournaments and prizes. Releasing December 2022 on Android.

card-3.description: The first battle royale made for web3. Explore and find the right mode for you with 5 exciting game modes in this fun, fast paced mobile shooter. Or build your own map with our leading UGC tool. Available on Android and soon on iOS.

card-4.description: Explore fully immersive worlds from the comfort of your phone. Multiverse focuses on high quality, interactive virtual environments and live events, including Music festivals such as Burning Man. Come Dance and explore in a new dimension!

card-1.title: Launch your Web3 monetization strategy
card-1.description: Turn any asset into an NFT and embed directly in your game, along with NFT Marketplaces, and tokens.

card-2.title: Integrate Web3 wallets easily
card-2.description: Let players connect Web3 wallets effortlessly for excellent UX with in-game transactions.

card-3.title: Compatible with Unity and Unreal Engine
card-3.description: Embed Ankr Gaming Web3 Tools directly into your gaming environment (UE coming soon)

mosaic-block.title: Mosaic
mosaic-block.description: The most accessible game services platform for web3
mosaic-block.feature-1: Seamlessly convert Web2 games to Web3

sdk-block.title: Take Your Existing Game to Web3 Today
sdk-block.description: Use one free SDK to give your game full blockchain, crypto, and Web3 capabilities.

slogan-block.title: “Ankr's SDK and development resources were extremely helpful. We could not have built Meta Apes this fast without their help.”
